parameters.name: marker
parameters.description: Specifies the marker after which the returned list begins.

parameters.name: maxItem
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: The names of the returned resources. The names must start with the value specified by the prefix parameter. If the prefix parameter is set to a, the names of the returned resources must start with a.

parameters.name: projectName
parameters.description: The name of the MaxCompute project.
